org.apache.poi.ss.formula

Class ConditionalFormattingEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.formula.ConditionalFormattingEvaluator

  • public class ConditionalFormattingEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    Evaluates Conditional Formatting constraints.

    For performance reasons, this class keeps a cache of all previously evaluated rules and cells. Be sure to call clearAllCachedFormats() if any conditional formats are modified, added, or deleted, and clearAllCachedValues() whenever cell values change.

    (计算条件约束。出于性能方面的考虑，此类保留了所有先前评估的规则和单元格的缓存。如果修改、添加或删除了任何条件格式，请务必调用clearAllCachedValues（），并且在单元格值更改时调用clearAllCachedValues（）。)

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAllCachedFormats()
      Call this whenever rules are added, reordered, or removed, or a rule formula is changed (not the formula inputs but the formula expression itself)(每当添加、重新排序或删除规则，或者更改规则公式时（不是公式输入，而是公式表达本身），都会调用此功能)
      void clearAllCachedValues()
      Call this whenever cell values change in the workbook, so condional formats are re-evaluated for all cells.(每当工作簿中的单元格值发生变化时，就会调用此命令，因此将为所有单元格重新评估条件格式。)
      java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getConditionalFormattingForCell(Cell cell)
      This checks all applicable ConditionalFormattingRules for the cell's sheet, in defined "priority" order, returning the matches if any.(这将按照定义的“优先级”顺序检查单元格工作表的所有适用的ConditionalDebtingRule，并返回匹配项（如果有的话）。)
      java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getConditionalFormattingForCell(CellReference cellRef)
      This checks all applicable ConditionalFormattingRules for the cell's sheet, in defined "priority" order, returning the matches if any.(这将按照定义的“优先级”顺序检查单元格工作表的所有适用的ConditionalDebtingRule，并返回匹配项（如果有的话）。)

      Retrieve all formatting rules for the given sheet.(初始化给定工作表的所有格式规则。)
      java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getFormatRulesForSheet(java.lang.String sheetName)
      Retrieve all formatting rules for the sheet with the given name.(初始化具有给定名称的工作表的所有格式规则。)

      • clearAllCachedValues

        public void clearAllCachedValues()
        Call this whenever cell values change in the workbook, so condional formats are re-evaluated for all cells.

        TODO: eventually this should work like EvaluationCache.notifyUpdateCell(int, int, EvaluationCell) and only clear values that need recalculation based on the formula dependency tree.

        (每当工作簿中的单元格值发生变化时，就会调用此命令，因此将为所有单元格重新评估条件格式。待办事项：最终，这应该像Evolationache.notifyUpdateCell（int，int，EvolationCell）一样工作，并且仅使用需要根据公式依赖树重新计算的明确值。)

      • getRules

        protected java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getRules(Sheet sheet)
        lazy load by sheet since reading can be expensive(由于阅读可能很贵，所以逐页懒惰加载)
        Parameters:
        sheet - The sheet to look at(床单-要查看的床单)
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of rules(不可修改的规则列表)

      • getConditionalFormattingForCell

        public java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getConditionalFormattingForCell(CellReference cellRef)
        This checks all applicable ConditionalFormattingRules for the cell's sheet, in defined "priority" order, returning the matches if any. This is a property currently not exposed from CTCfRule in XSSFConditionalFormattingRule.

        Most cells will have zero or one applied rule, but it is possible to define multiple rules that apply at the same time to the same cell, thus the List result.

        Note that to properly apply conditional rules, care must be taken to offset the base formula by the relative position of the current cell, or the wrong value is checked. This is handled by WorkbookEvaluator.evaluate(String, CellReference, CellRangeAddressBase).

        If the cell exists and is a formula cell, its cached value may be used for rule evaluation, so make sure it is up to date. If values have changed, it is best to call FormulaEvaluator.evaluateFormulaCell(Cell) or FormulaEvaluator.evaluateAll() first, or the wrong conditional results may be returned.

        (这将按照定义的“优先级”顺序检查单元格工作表的所有适用的ConditionalDebtingRule，并返回匹配项（如果有的话）。这是XSSFCConditionalInvestingRule中的CTCfRule中当前未公开的属性。大多数单元格将有零个或一个应用规则，但可以定义同时应用于同一单元格的多个规则，从而得到列表结果。请注意，要正确应用条件规则，必须小心通过当前单元格的相对位置来抵消基本公式，否则将检查错误的值。这由WorkbookEvolator. evalve（字符串、CellReference、CellRangeAddressBase）处理。如果该单元格存在并且是公式单元格，则其缓存值可能用于规则评估，因此请确保它是最新的。如果值发生变化，最好先调用FormulaEvolateFormulaCell（Cell）或FormulaEvolateAll（），否则可能会返回错误的条件结果。)
        Parameters:
        cellRef - NOTE: if no sheet name is specified, this uses the workbook active sheet(cellRef -注意：如果未指定工作表名称，则将使用工作簿活动工作表)
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable List of EvaluationConditionalFormatRules that apply to the current cell value, in priority order, as evaluated by Excel (smallest priority # for XSSF, definition order for HSSF), or null if none apply(不可修改的EvolationConditionalHandler规则列表，按优先级顺序，由Excel计算（XSSF的最小优先级#，HSSF的定义顺序），如果不适用，则为空)

      • getConditionalFormattingForCell

        public java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getConditionalFormattingForCell(Cell cell)
        This checks all applicable ConditionalFormattingRules for the cell's sheet, in defined "priority" order, returning the matches if any. This is a property currently not exposed from CTCfRule in XSSFConditionalFormattingRule.

        Most cells will have zero or one applied rule, but it is possible to define multiple rules that apply at the same time to the same cell, thus the List result.

        Note that to properly apply conditional rules, care must be taken to offset the base formula by the relative position of the current cell, or the wrong value is checked. This is handled by WorkbookEvaluator.evaluate(String, CellReference, CellRangeAddressBase).

        If the cell exists and is a formula cell, its cached value may be used for rule evaluation, so make sure it is up to date. If values have changed, it is best to call FormulaEvaluator.evaluateFormulaCell(Cell) or FormulaEvaluator.evaluateAll() first, or the wrong conditional results may be returned.

        (这将按照定义的“优先级”顺序检查单元格工作表的所有适用的ConditionalDebtingRule，并返回匹配项（如果有的话）。这是XSSFCConditionalInvestingRule中的CTCfRule中当前未公开的属性。大多数单元格将有零个或一个应用规则，但可以定义同时应用于同一单元格的多个规则，从而得到列表结果。请注意，要正确应用条件规则，必须小心通过当前单元格的相对位置来抵消基本公式，否则将检查错误的值。这由WorkbookEvolator. evalve（字符串、CellReference、CellRangeAddressBase）处理。如果该单元格存在并且是公式单元格，则其缓存值可能用于规则评估，因此请确保它是最新的。如果值发生变化，最好先调用FormulaEvolateFormulaCell（Cell）或FormulaEvolateAll（），否则可能会返回错误的条件结果。)
        Parameters:
        cell - The cell to look for(cell -要寻找的细胞)
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable List of EvaluationConditionalFormatRules that apply to the current cell value, in priority order, as evaluated by Excel (smallest priority # for XSSF, definition order for HSSF), or null if none apply(不可修改的EvolationConditionalHandler规则列表，按优先级顺序，由Excel计算（XSSF的最小优先级#，HSSF的定义顺序），如果不适用，则为空)

      • getRef

        public static CellReference getRef(Cell cell)

      • getFormatRulesForSheet

        public java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getFormatRulesForSheet(java.lang.String sheetName)
        Retrieve all formatting rules for the sheet with the given name.(初始化具有给定名称的工作表的所有格式规则。)
        Parameters:
        sheetName - The name of the sheet to look at(sheetName -要查看的表的名称)
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of all Conditional format rules for the given sheet, if any(给定工作表的所有条件格式规则的不可修改列表（如果有的话）)

      • getFormatRulesForSheet

        public java.util.List<EvaluationConditionalFormatRule> getFormatRulesForSheet(Sheet sheet)
        Retrieve all formatting rules for the given sheet.(初始化给定工作表的所有格式规则。)
        Parameters:
        sheet - The sheet to look at(床单-要查看的床单)
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of all Conditional format rules for the given sheet, if any(给定工作表的所有条件格式规则的不可修改列表（如果有的话）)

      • getMatchingCells

        public java.util.List<Cell> getMatchingCells(Sheet sheet,
                                             int conditionalFormattingIndex,
                                             int ruleIndex)
        Conditional formatting rules can apply only to cells in the sheet to which they are attached. The POI data model does not have a back-reference to the owning sheet, so it must be passed in separately.

        We could overload this with convenience methods taking a sheet name and sheet index as well.

        (条件格式规则只能应用于它们所附着到的工作表中的单元格。POI数据模型没有对所属工作表的反向引用，因此必须单独传入。我们可以用一些方便的方法重载它，这些方法也可以使用工作表名称和工作表索引。)
        Parameters:
        sheet - containing the rule(工作表-包含规则)
        conditionalFormattingIndex - of the ConditionalFormatting instance in the sheet's array(conditionalDeliveringIndex-工作表数组中ConditionalDeliveringIndex实例)
        ruleIndex - of the ConditionalFormattingRule instance within the ConditionalFormatting(ruleIndex -ConditionalButtingRule实例的ConditionalButtingRule)
        Returns:
        unmodifiable List of all cells in the rule's region matching the rule's condition(不可修改规则区域中匹配规则条件的所有单元格的列表)

      • getMatchingCells

        public java.util.List<Cell> getMatchingCells(EvaluationConditionalFormatRule rule)
        Retrieve all cells where the given formatting rule evaluates to true.(初始化给定格式规则计算结果为真的所有单元格。)
        Parameters:
        rule - The rule to look at(规则-要查看的规则)
        Returns:
        unmodifiable List of all cells in the rule's region matching the rule's condition(不可修改规则区域中匹配规则条件的所有单元格的列表)
